title: Glycinium cation - properties of sodium glycinate

content.question: Which of the following statements is true about sodium glycinate, represented above?

choices.label: It is an ionic solid at room temperature.
It is not soluble in water.
It evaporates easily because of the lack of hydrogen bonding.
It dissolves in water to form an acidic solution.

content.answer: It is an ionic solid at room temperature.

skill.text: 1.A: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate particulate-level properties only.
